    public class CompositeCfg
extends org.apache.commons.configuration.CompositeConfiguration
implements Configuration
    Slightly extended version of CompositeConfiguration

      • getStringArray

        public java.lang.String[] getStringArray(java.lang.String key,
                                         boolean showEncryptedValues,
                                         boolean logXPathErrors,
                                         boolean scanAllConfigurations,
                                         boolean noVariableInterpolation)
        Return list of values for key
        Parameters:
        key -
        showEncryptedValues - Should encrypted values (true) or handles (false) be shown?
        logXPathErrors - Should XPath exceptions be logged (true) or not (false)?
        scanAllConfigurations - Should the key be searched in all configurations/files (true) or only values from the first "hit" be returned (false)?
        Returns:

      • getStringArrayHideEncryptedValues

        public java.lang.String[] getStringArrayHideEncryptedValues(java.lang.String key)
        Return value but show only reference for encrypted values. To be used for listing available values in wx.config.impl.ui:getValuesForPackage and configFlowServiceAddValues.dsp .
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        See Also:
        but add this method. Otherwise an additional if statement would have been executed for every invocation, while it would be relevant only at design-time.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key)

      • toProperties

        public java.util.Properties toProperties(boolean errorOnValueLists,
                                         boolean errorOnXml)
        Convert contents to standard Properties.
        Parameters:
        errorOnValueLists - If true, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown, when a key returns a list of values rather than a single one. If false, the the values are just skipped.
        errorOnXml - If true, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown, when XML configuration is found. If false, the the values are just skipped.
        Returns:
